ProcessTemplates.Name: CSV file from SFTP server to MySQL Database Update
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template process retrieves a CSV file from an SFTP server, reads the contents and converts them to JSON, and creates and executes a MySQL UPDATE statement.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"FilePath":{"Value":"\"/myFolder/mySubfolder/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Path to CSV input data file."},"FileName":{"Value":"\"csv-update-data.csv\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of CSV input data file."},"ServerAddress":{"Value":"\"192.0.2.0\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server address"},"ServerUser":{"Value":"\"mySFTPUser\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server user."},"ServerPassword":{"Value":"\"mySFTPPassword\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server user's password."},"ConnectionString":{"Value":"\"Server=myServerAddress;Database=myDataBase;Uid=myUsername;Pwd=myPassword;\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Database connection string."},"TableName":{"Value":"\"myTable\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of database table to be updated"},"RowIndentifier":{"Value":"\"email\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Column name in the database that identifies individual rows."}}

Process.Name: CSV file from SFTP server to MySQL Database Update
Process.Description: This template process retrieves a CSV file from an SFTP server, reads the contents and converts them to JSON, and creates and executes a MySQL UPDATE statement.
